summary: Comprehensive testing of Meeting Form with MOM (Minutes of Meeting) feature - All 23 backend tests passed, all frontend UI components verified working
critical_code_review_comments: Meeting model correctly includes MOM fields: title, agenda, discussion_points, decisions_made, action_items, next_meeting_date, mom_generated, mom_sent_to_client
Action items properly support priority levels (low, medium, high) and status tracking (pending, in_progress, completed)
Follow-up task creation from action items works correctly with notify_reporting_manager option
Send MOM to client queues email notification to notifications collection (MOCKED - email sending not implemented)
Frontend Meetings.js has full MOM dialog with all required sections: Agenda, Discussion Points, Decisions Made, Action Items
Meeting cards show expandable details with action items list
MOM badge and Sent badge correctly displayed on meeting cards
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test meetings with MOM data during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: MOM feature fully tested. Key endpoints: POST /api/meetings (create), GET /api/meetings/{id} (get details), PATCH /api/meetings/{id}/mom (update MOM), POST /api/meetings/{id}/action-items (add action item), PATCH /api/meetings/{id}/action-items/{action_item_id} (update status), POST /api/meetings/{id}/send-mom (send to client), GET /api/follow-up-tasks. Frontend MOM dialog has data-testid='mom-btn-{meetingId}'. Meeting cards expandable to show action items.

mocked_apis_list: Email sending is MOCKED - notifications queued in notifications collection, not actually sent

Meetings Page.badges: MOM badge (green), Sent badge (blue), Delivered badge
